column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Food: Came here to try deep dish pizza for the first time and it did not disappoint. We tried two of their pizzas and they were great. Very hearty
column3: and quality ingredients. The food took a while to come out and I feel it would've been better if it were hotter
column4: however for my first deep dish the chain Lou Malnati's is not a bad bet.
